sentences.en: He faced me squarely across the table.
sentences.cn: 他在桌子那边正对着我.

sentences.en: He turned and faced her squarely.
sentences.cn: 他转过身来和她正面相对。

sentences.en: He wheeled about and faced his opponent squarely.
sentences.cn: 他突然转过身来,正视他的对手.

sentences.en: He wheeled and faced his opponent squarely.
sentences.cn: 他转过身来面对着他的对手.

sentences.en: I kept the gun aimed squarely at his eyes.
sentences.cn: 我一直将枪径直瞄准他的双眼。

sentences.en: I laid the matter squarely before him.
sentences.cn: 我把这一问题直截了当地向他提出来.

sentences.en: Physically, he was five feet in height, thickset and squarely built.
sentences.cn: 至于身格, 他身高五英尺, 臃肿,横阔.

sentences.en: Responsibility for success or failure lies squarely with the Nigerians.
sentences.cn: 成败完全取决于尼日利亚人。

sentences.en: Rhett looked her squarely in the eyes, his face blank.
sentences.cn: 瑞德勇敢地直视着她的眼睛, 他脸上显得毫无表情.

sentences.en: She hit him squarely on the nose.
sentences.cn: 她不偏不倚地打在他的鼻子上。

sentences.en: She looked at me squarely in the eye.
sentences.cn: 她直直地看着我的眼睛。

sentences.en: The blame was placed squarely on the doctor.
sentences.cn: 责任很明确地须由医生来承担.

sentences.en: The bullet hit him squarely between the shoulder blades.
sentences.cn: 子弹恰巧打在他的肩胛骨之间.

sentences.en: The management committee have faced the situation squarely.
sentences.cn: 管理委员会直面当前形势。

sentences.en: The president put the blame squarely on his opponent.
sentences.cn: 总统将责任完全归咎于对手。

sentences.en: They placed the blame squarely on the doctor.
sentences.cn: 他们直截了当地把责任归于医生.

sentences.en: We have to drop our pretences and look squarely at schooling as it really is.
sentences.cn: 我们必须抛开一切伪装，正视学校教育的真实情况。
